===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しゅうかく}}

# [[harvest]], [[crop]]
# [[harvesting]]

====Compounds====
{{top2}}
* [[収穫期]] (''shūkakuki''): harvest time
* [[収穫高]] (''shūkakudaka''): crop, income
* [[収穫祭]] (''shūkakusai''): harvest festival
* [[収穫時]] (''shūkakuji''): time of harvest
* [[収穫物]] (''shūkakubutsu''): the harvest, the yield
{{mid2}}
* [[収穫予想]] (''shūkaku yosō''): crop estimate
* [[収穫感謝祭]] (''shūkaku kanshasai''): Thanksgiving Day, harvest festival
* [[収穫逓減の法則]] (''shūkaku teigen no hōsoku''): law of diminishing returns, law of diminishing marginal returns
* [[予想収穫高]] (''yosō shūkakudaka''): crop estimate
* [[規模に関する収穫]] (''kibo ni kan suru shūkaku''): returns to scale
{{bottom}}
